description:
Mod that changes the loot tables and some crafting recipes in order to make scrap more enjoyable and less grindy.
Works on version 0.6.2

CONTENT:
- Better refinery output
- More drops from flowers, beehives, wocs etc.
- Better bot, crate loot

If found any bugs related to this mod, contact me on Discord JustMaxior#5757
File mod version over at Github.
name: Better Loot Table Mod
